name: Admin
shortDescription: Manage your dGuild settings, modules, branding, and team.
longDescription: The Admin module is the control center for your dGuild. Configure branding and theming, enable or disable modules, manage marketplace settings, set up Discord integration, and control who has access to administrative functions.
keyInfo: Configure branding, logos, and theme colors

slug.name: Custom slug
slug.shortDescription: Custom subdomain for your dGuild (e.g. skull.dguild.org).
